name: electrobun
description: Build ultra fast, tiny, and cross-platform desktop apps with Typescript.
author: Blackboard Technologies Inc.

scripts.install-zig:mac: mkdir -p vendors/zig && curl -L https://ziglang.org/download/0.13.0/zig-macos-aarch64-0.13.0.tar.xz | tar -xJ --strip-components=1 -C vendors/zig zig-macos-aarch64-0.13.0/zig zig-macos-aarch64-0.13.0/lib  zig-macos-aarch64-0.13.0/doc
scripts.install-zig:windows: mkdir -p vendors/zig && curl -L https://ziglang.org/download/0.13.0/zig-windows-aarch64-0.13.0.zip -o vendors/zig.zip && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command Expand-Archive -Path vendors/zig.zip -DestinationPath vendors/zig-temp && mv vendors/zig-temp/zig-windows-aarch64-0.13.0/zig.exe vendors/zig && mv vendors/zig-temp/zig-windows-aarch64-0.13.0/lib vendors/zig/
scripts.install-cef: cd vendors/cef && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DPROJECT_ARCH="arm64" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make -j8 libcef_dll_wrapper
scripts.build:objc:staticlib: mkdir -p src/zig/build && clang++ -o src/zig/build/libObjcWrapper.dylib src/objc/build/objcWrapper.o -framework Cocoa -framework WebKit -framework QuartzCore -F./vendors/cef/Release -weak_framework 'Chromium Embedded Framework' -L./vendors/cef/build/libcef_dll_wrapper -lcef_dll_wrapper -stdlib=libc++ -shared -install_name @executable_path/libObjcWrapper.dylib
scripts.build:cef:helper:macos:link: clang++ -mmacosx-version-min=10.13 -std=c++17 src/objc/build/process_helper_mac.o -o src/zig/build/process_helper -framework Cocoa -framework WebKit -framework QuartzCore -F./vendors/cef/Release -framework "Chromium Embedded Framework" -L./vendors/cef/build/libcef_dll_wrapper -lcef_dll_wrapper -stdlib=libc++
scripts.build:cef:helper:macos:fix: install_name_tool -change "@executable_path/../Frameworks/Chromium Embedded Framework.framework/Chromium Embedded Framework" "@executable_path/../../../../Frameworks/Chromium Embedded Framework.framework/Chromium Embedded Framework" src/zig/build/process_helper
scripts.build:cef:helper: bun build:cef:helper:macos && bun build:cef:helper:macos:link && bun build:cef:helper:macos:fix
scripts.build:debug: npm install && bun build:zig:trdiff && bun build:objc && bun build:cef:helper && bun build:zig && bun build:launcher && bun build:extractor && bun build:cli
scripts.build:release: bun build:objc && bun build:zig:trdiff:release && bun build:zig:release && bun build:launcher:release && bun build:extractor:release && bun build:cli
scripts.build:electrobun: bun build:objc && bun build:zig && bun build:bun
scripts.dev:playground: bun build:dev && cd playground && npm install && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.dev:playground:canary: bun build:package && cd playground && npm install && bun build:canary && bun start:canary
